circuit_id.name: circuit_id
circuit_id.description: The id of the circuit to be failed over.
circuit_id.validation_error_text: Parameter circuit_id only accepts integer numbers.

workgroup_id.name: workgroup_id
workgroup_id.description: The workgroup ID that the circuit belongs to.
workgroup_id.validation_error_text: Parameter workgroup_id only accepts integer numbers.

force.name: force
force.description: If the circuit has to be forcefully failed over even if alternate path is down.
force.validation_error_text: Parameter force only accepts either 0 or 1 for false or true values, respectively.

name: fail_over_circuit
description: Changes a circuit over to its backup path (if it has one)
